name: Snow Go
description:
Game Play

Snow Go is a Top Down retro skiing game where you reach the bottom of the mountain to win the game.  You will be timed so try your best! 

You can reduce your times by passing through the flags which each take 3 seconds each or you can also collect Clocks to deduct 2 seconds of your total time!

How to Play

The Player will be frozen initially. Press ANY key to begin the level.

Use the A and D keys to slide left and right. 

Press R to restart the level anytime.

If you crash into a Tree you will automically lose and the level will restart. 

Once you reach the bottom, the timer deduction based on the number of flags you've passed will occur. The timer will then pause and showcase your final time. 

Made by Team 1:
